tools.name: tavily_search_results_json
tools.description: A search engine optimized for comprehensive, accurate, and trusted results. Useful for when you need to answer questions about current events. Input should be a search query. This returns only the answer - not the original source data.

A wrapper around Arxiv.org. Useful for when you need to answer questions about Physics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Quantitative Biology, Quantitative Finance, Statistics, Electrical Engineering, and Economics from scientific articles on arxiv.org. Input should be a search query.
